name: Beyond Closed Doors (CHAPTER 1 / DEMO)
description:
Beyond Closed Doors is my second official game, first made with no tutorial with the help of a multitude of people! 

You awaken in your laboratory,  drenched in sweat after hearing blood curdling screams.  You hold tightly to your only source of light, and wander into the gloomy lab. Will you make it out alive?

The game will release in 3 chronological chapters, chapter 1 being the only chapter right now. 

(I tried my best with using Unity's timeline system, still learning and will definitely improve it when chapter 2 rolls around!)

CREDITS:

Thank you to:

Spooder Foosh#2185 -> Monster; "Herbert" Model

Chak#7006 -> Music

DarkAltrax -> Voice Lines

And more to come in the future!

GAME FUTURE & PLANS:

1. Fix up chapter 1 cutscenes and make them less choppy and smoother after chapter 2

2. Occlusion culling breaks in corridor to main hall when going backwards

3. Pedestal in maze room has no collision

4. Begin chapter 2 development
